entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
